origin.extra_origin_powers.breath_attack: This is an example origin from the Extra Origin Powers mod! It showcases the breath attack power, crafting blocker power and the entity type in range condition.
origin.extra_origin_powers.circle_attack: This is an example origin from the Extra Origin Powers mod! It showcases the circle attack power, crafting blocker power and trinket starter equipment power.
power.extra_origin_powers.breath_attack_: This breath attack shoots a line of "acid" dealing 2.5 damage and giving wither 2 for 100 ticks to anyone who is hit.
power.extra_origin_powers.circle_attack_: This circle attack throws away entities in a 6 block radius giving them slowness and giving the one using this power resistance.
power.extra_origin_powers.crafting_block: This power allows this origin to craft items from extra_origin_powers, blocking them for all other origins who don't have this mod in their crafting blocker.
power.extra_origin_powers.entity_type_co: This power gives the user speed and resistance if a sheep or cow is in place.
power.extra_origin_powers.trinket_equipm: This power tries to equip the potato_crown to the user, if it fails it will give it in its inventory.
